dc_title_s: Rest Areas and MnDOT Facilities: Minnesota
dc_description_s: The physical location of the occupied maintenance sites for MNDOT roadways. This includes facilities such as truck stations, district offices, weigh stations, etc. Minnesota Department of Transportation Rest Areas is a collection of points representing the Rest Areas, Travel Information Centers, and Wayside Rests which are owned or operated by the Minnesota Department of Transportation. Check other metadata records in this package for more information on Rest Areas and MnDOT facilities.
